name: orchestrate_aura_migration
description: Use this tool to orchestrate a workflow to convert or migrate a Salesforce Aura component into its Lightning Web Component (LWC) equivalent. The input can be either an Aura component bundle file (e.g., .cmp, .controller.js, .helper.js, etc.) or a directory containing Aura component bundle files.

files.description: Component files as key-value pairs where key is filename and value is file content. Can be passed as an object or JSON string.
